► Hosting Features ◄

  • ☆ Money Back Guarantee - We offer 30 day money back guarantee for all of our plans, no questions asked.
  • ☆ 100% Uptime SLA - We know how important it is for your servers to remain online. This is why we have a comprehensive Service Level Agreement (SLA).
  • ☆ Free DDoS Protection - DDoS protection comes standard for all of our servers because we understand how frustrating it can be for your servers to be unreachable due to DDoS attacks.
  • ☆ Underloaded Nodes - We keep all of our nodes underloaded and within a safe range of its resource capacities which improves performance and stability.
  • ☆ Virtualizor Control Panel - We use Virtualizor as our control panel which allows you to easily manage your servers with a single click.
  • ☆ In-house Team - We do not outsource anyone, period. To effectively serve your needs, the team at ExtremeVM are experienced in the industry and understand English fluently.

► Frequently Asked Questions ◄

• How long does it take to provision my server?

All orders are automatically activated within seconds upon payment.

• What payment methods are accepted?

We only accept payments via PayPal. Cryptocurrencies are not accepted.

• Can I have a trial account?

Since all of our services are backed with a 30 day money back guarantee, we do not offer trial accounts. If you do not feel satisfied with your service, we will be more than happy to give you a refund, no questions asked.
